hymn.title: Be Strong and of Good Courage
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—Be Strong

layout.singingstanza: Be strong and of good cour -- age, Do not be a -- fraid, Nei -- ther be dis -- mayed, For Je -- ho -- vah your God is with you, Wher -- ev -- er you go.

lyrics.stanza: Be strong and of good courage, Do not be afraid, Neither be dismayed, For Jehovah your God is with you, Wherever you go.
